ArcWeb Services Samples

Services Description
PlaceFinderSample The Place Finder Sample Web Service is a public service and no token is required. This sample illustrates how to use the Place Finder Sample Web Service to return a list of locations and coordinates based on input location
PlaceFinder This sample illustrates how to use the Place Finder Web Service to return a list of locations and coordinates based on input location.
AddressFinder
(Geocoding)		 This sample illustrates how to use the Address Finder Web Service to retrieve a list of addresses and locations that match the input address.
AddressFinder
(Reverse Geocoding)		 This sample illustrates how to use the Address Finder Web Service to retrieve the address that match the input x,y-coordinates.
RouteFinder This sample illustrates how to use the Route Finder Web Service to generate driving directions between two locations. The returned results are displayed as a route map and written route directions. The sample also uses the Address Finder Web Service to return the x and y values for the specified address.
MapImage This sample illustrates how to use the Map Image Web Service to generate a dynamic map based on one of many data sources at a specified geographic extent. The sample allows the user to add a legend, scalebar, modify the maps background color, a nd draw icons or circles to specify a point of interest.
MapImage
(Thematic Map)		 This sample illustrates how to use the Map Image Web Service to generate a thematic map image based on ESRI demographic variables.
Query This sample illustrates how to use the Query Web Service to return information about the selected location. The sample also uses the Address Finder Web Service to return the x and y values for the specified address.
Proximity This sample illustrates how to use the Proximity Web Service to find locations within a specified distance of an address. The sample also uses the Address Finder Web Service to return the x and y values for the specified address.
Utility
(Projection)		 This sample illustrates how to use the Utility Web Service to change the coordinate system of a point or envelope.
Report
(Site Report)		 This sample illustrates how to use the Report Web Service to get a pre-formatted report for a specified site
